questions.quote: This isn't going to work for me ... so if you could show me something else.
This is terrible. What is this, ginger? I hate ginger. I can't understand how anyone can eat ginger.
Oh, you don't see. You don't see. Well it happened. Believe me.
Why? Did she say something to you about why she broke up with me?
Now you didn't tell me you didn't know how to drive. You should have mentioned that.
Well if you and I ever got into, like a really serious fight you know, and the punches started flying -- who do you think would win?
If you want to watch, sit down. You're making me nervous. I tell you this Scissorhands is a hell of a barber.
I see here that you play the harp.. tell me, why do you have to tilt it? Can't you just build it on an angle? It'd save you a lot of trouble.
All right, Even Steven. Oh, by the way, when you get back to your apartment try to keep it down because Newman is taking a nap in your bed.
Could be years before I get back to Coney Island. I can't go to rides alone.
